trivia

Class Questions

  • java.lang.Object
    • trivia.Questions

  • public class Questions
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads in all questions based on categories selected, then offers a way to retrieve those questions and their right answer.
    Author:
    Cody Swendrowski, Dan Miller

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Questions(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String[] names)
      Creates a new Questions controller.
